entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: CollectionsMarshal method enumerating Dictionary<TKey, TValue>'s Values by reference. #58333
  • API Proposal: Value factory ctor on System.Threading.AsyncLocal<T> #58332
  • VersionConverter.ConvertTo/From may fail with Version and InstanceDescriptor types #58331
  • Breaking changes on ConfigurationBinder behaviour #58330
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a NumericFormat API to avoid magic string constants #58329
  • The application to execute does not exist runtime/artifacts/bin/coreclr/windows.x64.Debug/DacTableGen/DacTableGen.dll' #58328
    7.0.0
  • Cannot create AF_VSOCK Sockets due to overly strict SocketPal #58327
  • TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId returning false for an IANA timezone on Linux #58326
    6.0.0
  • workload notfound in stalling Workload microsoft-net-sdk-blazorwebassembly-aot #58325

Closed

  • Collecting database events from a .NET 6 application causes it to crash #57709
    6.0.0
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed 'verCurrentState.esStackDepth == 0 Morph - Inlining' #57909
    7.0.0
  • Concatenation of interpolated strings is corrupted #58288

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/6.0] [mono] Allow RuntimeType arguments in CustomAttributeBuilder #58317
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Disable JitStress for Github_25027 #58250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: add PGO random stress testing support #58294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Only report live ranges for allocated variables #57843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Refactor fgInitArgInfo to track non standard arg kinds #58324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wip] Run tests on Android 21 #54217
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Elide SocketFlags in Socket API #57634
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix fgValueNumberArrIndexVal for wide reads #58309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Improve FileProviders.Physical tests to reuse existing helper types #58155
    test enhancement, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup XPath.StringToDouble #55867
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FormatValueAsString() running too often too many times. #35908
  • Perf regression: https, multiple_queries #35907
  • Leverage `EditorBrowsable` attribute to hide unnecessary methods #35906
  • Move OpenAPI extension methods out of MVC assembly #35905
    6.0-rc2
  • Allow Custom JsonSerializerOptions for Minimal Actions #35904
  • Server side validation message does not show inside a PartialView #35903
  • Hot reload not working in visual studio 2022 preview #35902

Closed

  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #35818
  • Startup improvement: mvc #35819

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
  • Mechanism for providing validation CSS class names through DI #34777
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Added support for Int64 and DateTime #35855
    area-runtime, community-contribution
